pages.css: <style>.Dialog-box { width: 50%; max-height: 100%; position: fixed; bottom: 50%; left: 50%; box-shadow: 0px 3px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14); z-index: 10; background: #fff; border-radius: 6px; padding: 24px; transform: translate(-50%, 50%); overflow: auto; overflow-wrap: anywhere; } .Dialog-content-header { margin-bottom: 16px; font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-style: normal; font-weight: 600; font-size: 24px; line-height: 24px; text-align: left; } .Dialog-content-description { font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; text-align: left; } .Dialog-accept-button { box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; width: fit-content; padding: 2px 20px; border-radius: 4px; background-color: #0078d4; color: #fff; text-decoration: none; text-align: center; font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-size: 13px; line-height: 21px; cursor: pointer; border: none; margin: 4px 5px; } .Dialog-decline-button { box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; width: fit-content; padding: 2px 20px; border-radius: 4px; background-color: #0078d4; color: #fff; text-decoration: none; text-align: center; font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-size: 13px; line-height: 21px; cursor: pointer; border: none; margin: 4px 5px; } .Dialog-model-buttonactions { margin-top: 10px; width: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; } .Dialog-model-primary-buttons { display: flex; flex-direction: row; } @media screen and (max-width : 768px) { .Dialog-accept-button { width: calc(100% - 40px); } .Dialog-decline-button { width: calc(100% - 40px); } .Dialog-customize-button { width: calc(100% - 40px); } .Dialog-model-buttonactions { flex-direction: column; } .Dialog-box { bottom: 0; left: 0; transform: translate(0, 0); box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 0px rgb(204 204 204 / 80%); width: calc(100% - 16px); padding: 8px; } .Dialog-content-description { text-align: center; } .Dialog-content-header { text-align: center; } }</style>
